underlying_goal: Test and debug a multi-step fortune product registration and content generation orchestrator workflow, identifying and resolving issues in the pipeline (bulk reflection, manuscript generation, PPV registration, session initialization)
friction_detail: Multiple repetitive grep searches yielded no actionable results before reaching substantive findings; STEP 2 PPV edit link detection failed without root cause resolution; PydanticSerializationUnexpectedValue caused misleading 0-subtitle report despite successful generation.
brief_summary: User tested bulk menu reflection (succeeded), then debugged a multi-step fortune product registration pipeline where STEP 1 serialization warnings, STEP 2 edit link failures, and session initialization gaps were identified but only partially resolved after extensive code investigation.
